column7: Review

This app usually works great, my favorite app. I purchased YouTube Premium with Google Pay, I knew it was good because I had it on my last phone. For almost a week now though there is no sound on the videos, and can't get in touch with Google for help. YouTube chat couldn't help. Lot of things on ph...Full ReviewThis app usually works great, my favorite app. I purchased YouTube Premium with Google Pay, I knew it was good because I had it on my last phone. For almost a week now though there is no sound on the videos, and can't get in touch with Google for help. YouTube chat couldn't help. Lot of things on phone that is strange. I'm going to give it until the end of the day, then have no choice but to get rid of this phone. Shame, I really like it too.

I truly want the platforms I use to generate income, they deserve it. The app has a gold mine of content and is undoubtedly ahead of the game. But the adverts have become so frequent, long and irritating that it's become mentally draining to use. Im calling my phone a @#&¬£ when relaxing to music in ...Full ReviewI truly want the platforms I use to generate income, they deserve it. Im calling my phone a @#&¬£ when relaxing to music in the bath and two forced adverts kick off or the dreaded are you still watching. I don't need that kind of stress. 3 stars purely for the content would be 5 if you could reign it in a bi

We have used Youtube for litterally decades. One of the best apps with the least issues, problems were very rare. Now over the last 2weeks using the app simply is not pleasurable, specifically casting to TV/device. To perform a single action, play, or jump to a spot takes at least two taps. The func...Full ReviewWe have used Youtube for litterally decades. One of the best apps with the least issues, problems were very rare. Now over the last 2weeks using the app simply is not pleasurable, specifically casting to TV/device. To perform a single action, play, or jump to a spot takes at least two taps. The functions simply dont work on first command. Layout with small comment sections worse too. Awful app now.

Bruv, what went wrong? I upgraded to the S20 Ultra with every update installed, can't even use mini player/screen on screen. It'll fully freak out and then I can't even resume the video. Happens every time I'm in landscape mode then open a notification straight from the notification bar. Sometimes I...Full ReviewBruv, what went wrong? I upgraded to the S20 Ultra with every update installed, can't even use mini player/screen on screen. It'll fully freak out and then I can't even resume the video. Happens every time I'm in landscape mode then open a notification straight from the notification bar. Sometimes I even have to turn my phone off just to close it. It's fully broken.

Removed crowd-source captions option, which is awful not just for people who consume content around the world (which for a global app, that means practically everyone - we don't all just consume entertainment in our own language, you know?), but ESPECIALLY for deaf and hard-of-hearing people everywh...Full ReviewRemoved crowd-source captions option, which is awful not just for people who consume content around the world (which for a global app, that means practically everyone - we don't all just consume entertainment in our own language, you know?), but ESPECIALLY for deaf and hard-of-hearing people everywhere. And on Deaf Awareness Week? Yikes. How exclusionary to so many people around the world! Awful choice.

The app was working fine for me but ever since last update, sometimes when i open the app it just keeps reloading and nothing else for about 5 or 10 minutes, also it automatically switches the resolution to 144p sometimes even when i have 4G active and the only two resolution options i see are 144p ...Full ReviewThe app was working fine for me but ever since last update, sometimes when i open the app it just keeps reloading and nothing else for about 5 or 10 minutes, also it automatically switches the resolution to 144p sometimes even when i have 4G active and the only two resolution options i see are 144p or 720p. Its a real pain when you have lectures to attend and either of this happen. Please fix this whenever you can.

1st it's tcalled volumization, making all videos the same playback volume. It's past time for you to fix this simple longterm issue. For listening to music/meditation its WORTHLESS. This app was FREE of all, no Commercials, and as a bet...Full Review1st it's tcalled volumization, making all videos the same playback volume. This app was FREE of all, no Commercials, and as a beta supporter I feel ripped off. Totally disappointed with all of it. Though im sure my opinion is worthless to the greedy mongers who use your music and videos for profit.

YouTube is the best app to watch videos . I enjoyed it so much. It's a great app but there's something wrong with this. I should have rated a 5 stars if all the videos are allowed to download. Some can be downloaded but others like songs, etc. are not . I would like the YouTube owner to fix this pro...Full ReviewYouTube is the best app to watch videos . I enjoyed it so much. It's a great app but there's something wrong with this. I should have rated a 5 stars if all the videos are allowed to download. Some can be downloaded but others like songs, etc. are not . I would like the YouTube owner to fix this problem for better using

App freezes and won't load anything after a few videos, or when leaving the app and returning. Constantly closing the app to get videos to play again, if but for a short while. Extremely annoying. Restarting, clearing data and clearing cache doesnt work. Lots of other people with the same issues, no...Full ReviewApp freezes and won't load anything after a few videos, or when leaving the app and returning. Constantly closing the app to get videos to play again, if but for a short while. Extremely annoying. Restarting, clearing data and clearing cache doesnt work. Lots of other people with the same issues, no solutions it seems.

Constantly closes down the app on TV whilst streaming if I discconectmy my phone. Songs come up saying unavailable on YouTube music but the exact same video is available on regular YouTube. Takes me forever to scroll to the bottom of my playlist. And, if I don't want to start my playlist from the be...Full ReviewConstantly closes down the app on TV whilst streaming if I discconectmy my phone. And, if I don't want to start my playlist from the beginning on the TV app, the only way around it is to play the playlist, scroll through the playlist on the play next section, choose the last song until it eventually shows the song you want to start

I've grown up with youtube and I have seen it change drastically. I will no longer use this app because it's a far cry of what it used to be. This is just an app utilized for corporate greed. Your ads are repetitive and a huge nuisance not mention they publicly advertise things that aren't accurate ...Full ReviewI've grown up with youtube and I have seen it change drastically. I will no longer use this app because it's a far cry of what it used to be. This is just an app utilized for corporate greed. Your ads are repetitive and a huge nuisance not mention they publicly advertise things that aren't accurate but youtube doesn't care because they get paid to play them. They don't work on me because I'm an adult now but I can only imagine how many times these kids have fallen victim to the predatorial ads.

I used to be able to buy movies on google play, pay with my at&t account, and watch them on youtube on my ps4 or anything else with youtube app, all my existing purchases are still there but any new purchases DO NOT SHOW UP.. for some reason that is no longer possible, when I did not have Premium it...Full ReviewI used to be able to buy movies on google play, pay with my at&t account, and watch them on youtube on my ps4 or anything else with youtube app, all my existing purchases are still there but any new purchases DO NOT SHOW UP.. for some reason that is no longer possible, when I did not have Premium it worked fine now it's $#!+...why youtube??? Why?? I'm paying monthly premium for this?

Your ads are atrocious. You don't make me want to buy into anything of yours. You make me want to forget everything there is about YouTube. Like making me watch ads at the END of a video, making me think there's more video to watch after but then finding that I'm at the END... And now I need to watc...Full ReviewYour ads are atrocious. You don't make me want to buy into anything of yours. You make me want to forget everything there is about YouTube. Like making me watch ads at the END of a video, making me think there's more video to watch after but then finding that I'm at the END... And now I need to watch TWO MORE ads for another video? Stop shoving four ads in my face in between two videos. Get it together, YouTube.

This application has many problems! This will be very useful for students who are preparing for their exams or are trying to...Full ReviewYouTube is definitely good BUT let me suggest something:- there should be filters that is all videos should be under different categories which allows us to watch only those videos whose category we have chosen. Seriously?!? Some months ago I've written a review stating that youtube after 20 mins starts to lag, so I have to close it, wait some minutes and then reopen it. It's really annoying! It's been more than half a year now and I see that there are other people experiencing the same problems as me and t...Full ReviewSeriously?!? It's been more than half a year now and I see that there are other people experiencing the same problems as me and there are literally no changes! What are reviews for you? Just there to be pretty or what?

Buffers every second on 60fps on my mobile network, and there is no option to disable high framerates. At first I thought it was my old phone/provider, but I just bought a new phone and switched to Verizon, yet I still have this issue. Due to the videos I watch, I cannot make out the small text at 4...Full ReviewBuffers every second on 60fps on my mobile network, and there is no option to disable high framerates. At first I thought it was my old phone/provider, but I just bought a new phone and switched to Verizon, yet I still have this issue. Due to the videos I watch, I cannot make out the small text at 480p, but the only options for hd are in 60fps. When searching this issue online, I was just met with a youtube rep saying "You're phone's just slow." Real helpful, considering it was made in 2019.

It is such a entertainment. I watch this app most of the time. If there is nothing to do u can always watch fun videos here. It is also my most used app in the phone. Just cool enough to describe. Really wish they'd fix whatever they've screwed up in that department.

Ads when you start a video, ads in between and ads an the end. Increased unskipable ads and at times 2nd ad runs right after that! Sometimes when you dont skip an ad and let it play out, it just plays the next!!! Significant increase in ads from the last few updates. Enough already!!!!!!!

90 percent of my recommendations are videos I've already seen. Ad breaks come in at awkward moments during the video. Often mid sentence. Too much advertising in general, same ads over and over and over. This platform used to be great. It's sad to see what it has become.

Please allow the selection of all available stream resolutions in the "Download Quality" section of the app. I would very much like to download at 480p resolution, as it really is the best compromise between size and quality, especially on smaller screens. Also there doesn't seem to be any reason to...Full ReviewPlease allow the selection of all available stream resolutions in the "Download Quality" section of the app. I would very much like to download at 480p resolution, as it really is the best compromise between size and quality, especially on smaller screens. Also there doesn't seem to be any reason to limit the range of resolutions in the first place, especially since it is a Premium-only feature anyway.

Ads have gotten out of hand. There are ads before you watch the video, 1-2 ads multiple times in the middle of the video, 1-2 ads if you minimize and reopen YouTube on a video, and ad bar beneath the video. Since YouTube demonetizes people seemingly at random, the content creators have their own ads...Full ReviewAds have gotten out of hand. There are ads before you watch the video, 1-2 ads multiple times in the middle of the video, 1-2 ads if you minimize and reopen YouTube on a video, and ad bar beneath the video. Since YouTube demonetizes people seemingly at random, the content creators have their own ads on top of that. Alternatively, you can pay money to have the same experience YouTube used to have before Google got a hold of it. This is what happens when you have a monopoly.

YouTube on my Roku TV is trash. I'm shown the same recommendations and recently uploaded videos including videos I've already watched. You used to be able to refresh the list by clicking on the category on the left, but now it doesn't work. Leaving and coming back doesn't refresh either. I listen to soothing relaxing youtubes to go to sleep. Now, when they end, either an ad or another video start playing, jarring me awake or stopping me from falling asleep. I thought i could click on stop autoplay to keep this from happening, but i cant find it half the time.. id like to turnbit off...Full ReviewI listen to soothing relaxing youtubes to go to sleep. Now, when they end, either an ad or another video start playing, jarring me awake or stopping me from falling asleep. I thought i could click on stop autoplay to keep this from happening, but i cant find it half the time.. id like to turnbit off all the time, not every time I listen to a video to sleep or relax! Not cool, youtube.

Good app, lots of content but has big issues that should be addressed but the one I'll address right now, which inspired this review, is your subscription channel list. Who decided that when I back out of a channel back to my subscription list that I should be sent all the way to top of my subbed ch...Full ReviewGood app, lots of content but has big issues that should be addressed but the one I'll address right now, which inspired this review, is your subscription channel list. Who decided that when I back out of a channel back to my subscription list that I should be sent all the way to top of my subbed channels instead of where I was on the list. The fact that this wasn't a problem before makes this more infuriating but given how many people talk about issues with no change yall clearly don't care.

You know, it's funny how a lot of people complain about ads. With the pop up videos and the the videos that you have to watch sometimes before you can watch a video. With all these ad blockers, it seems like it's just another way to enable whiners. If you like something that you're getting for free ...Full ReviewYou know, it's funny how a lot of people complain about ads. With the pop up videos and the the videos that you have to watch sometimes before you can watch a video. With all these ad blockers, it seems like it's just another way to enable whiners. If you like something that you're getting for free please support them by watching their ads. Lift them up, don't knock them down cuz they're doing you a service, a really good one.

I don't know how else to get through, but I've an account called 'Horror Field' and it's eligible for monetization, however every time I try to apply, it won't let me due to "sensitive information". I've tried this multiple times using the same phone and computer over the same Wi-Fi. I can tolerate home ads, banner ads, and other minor annoyances. B...Full ReviewI switched to using my browser and an alternative YouTube app, both of which block ads. FYI, commercials are part of why I stopped watching television. Think about that before chasing your own obsolescence.
